Added 

[TeXFonts]
; TX Adobe Times
rtxptmb=TeXBase1Encoding,Times-Bold,
rtxptmbo=TeXBase1Encoding,Times-Bold,.167 SlantFont
rtxptmbi=TeXBase1Encoding,Times-BoldItalic,
rtxptmr=TeXBase1Encoding,Times-Roman,
rtxptmro=TeXBase1Encoding,Times-Roman,.167 SlantFont
rtxptmri=TeXBase1Encoding,Times-Italic,

2010/03/21 Added maps for Helvetica fonts ...

[TeXFonts]
; (V904-20100321) Adobe Helvetica 
rtxphvr=TeXBase1Encoding,Helvetica,
rtxphvro=TeXBase1Encoding,Helvetica,.167 SlantFont
rtxphvb=TeXBase1Encoding,Helvetica-Bold,
rtxphvbo=TeXBase1Encoding,Helvetica-Bold,.167 SlantFont
